description: ghoulish-looking figures; six male dancers wearing bells on bracelets and anklets; man playing a horn in URC; wrinkled woman at center with two goiters holding a staff with sausages in her PL hand and a small jug in her PR hand

title: Moresca Dancers Surrounding a Sausage Seller
